title: Time-Based Aging in TimesTen Classic
sql:
CREATE ASYNCHRONOUS WRITETHROUGH CACHE GROUP ordered_items
FROM sales.orders
 (
  ord_num      NUMBER(10) NOT NULL,
  cust_num     NUMBER(6) NOT NULL,
  when_placed  DATE NOT NULL,
  when_shipped DATE NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY(ord_num)
  )
     AGING USE when_placed 
     LIFETIME 45 DAYS 
     CYCLE 60 MINUTES ON,        
sales.order_item
 (
  orditem_id NUMBER(12) NOT NULL,
  ord_num    NUMBER(10),
  prod_num   VARCHAR2(6),
  quantity   NUMBER(3),
  PRIMARY KEY(orditem_id), FOREIGN KEY(ord_num) REFERENCES sales.orders(ord_num)
  )
;

selection.hint: Cache instances older than 45 days are candidate for aging
